矠字的基本解释

矠
zé
矛一类的兵器。
用叉矛刺取：“矠鱼鳖以为夏犒。”

矠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zé］
［《廣韻》士革切，入麥，崇。］
［《廣韻》楚革切，入麥，初。］
以矛叉刺取。

矠字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【矛字部】　矠； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页822第26
【唐韻】士革切，音賾。【說文】矛屬。【廣韻】以矛取物也。　又【廣韻】楚革切【集韻】測革切，?音策。義同。　又刺取也。【魯語】矠魚?。　又【集韻】仕角切，音浞。刺也。　本作?。【集韻】亦作捔?簎。【正譌】別作擉。

矠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
矠字的起名意思

暂无。

矠
Basic explanation of words
矠
zé
Weapons such as spears.
Stabbed with a fork spear: "The fish and turtle thought Xia Yan."
矠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zé］
["Guangyun" Shige cut, into wheat, Chong. ]
["Guangyun" Chu Geqi, into wheat, early. ]
Take it with a spear and fork.
矠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Spear Word Department] 　矠; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 822 26
[Tang Yun] Shige cut, sound. [Said the text] Spear belongs to. [Guang Yun] Take things with spears.　[Guangyun] Chu Geqie [Jiyun] Test Geqie,? Yince. The same meaning.　Take it again. [Lu language] Fish?　[Jiyun] Shijiao cut, sound 浞. Thorn too.　This work?. [Ji Yun] also make a beating? [Zhengzheng] Don't betray.
